ch0003_00_calme/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi, I was waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Things get so slow
when you’re not around.
ch0003_00_calme/0101_0701_02_10:
Want to see which one of us can get
stronger today?
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_01_10:
My partner, Espurr, is a pretty popular Pokémon
in the Kalos region.
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_02_10:
A lot of people keep them out of their
Poké Balls, since they’re so friendly
and affectionate.
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_03_10:
Of course, they’re also great in battle.
You should see what mine can do!
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0701_04_10:
He’s my trusted partner, and we aim 
to become stronger together.
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0702_01_10:
Only great Trainers like me can have
Espurr as a partner.
ch0003_00_calme/0601_0702_02_10:
Mine does have a sweet tooth, though.
He’s snuck off with my snacks more than once.
ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_01_10: Pasio is a completely different world from Kalos.
ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_02_10:
I wonder... I trained pretty hard in Kalos,
but how far will those skills take me here?
ch0003_00_calme/0603_0701_03_10:
To be honest, I’m scared to find out—but more
than that, I’m excited!
ch0003_00_calme/0603_0702_01_10: I will overcome any obstacle Pasio throws at me!
ch0003_00_calme/0603_0702_02_10:
I wear this hat to remind me of how determined
I am. As long as I’m wearing it, I won’t forget!
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_01_10:
Having good teamwork is tricky, isn’t it?
Different Trainers and Pokémon move at
different rhythms and everything.
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_02_10:
When you think about it, you’re able to sync up
immediately with lots of different Trainers.
That’s a kind of talent, you know?
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_03_10: I hope you keep on strengthening your talents.
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0701_04_10: I think that’s how you’ll get stronger.
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0702_01_10:
Different people have different ways of becoming
strong. I’ll get stronger in a different way
than you.
ch0003_00_calme/0604_0702_02_10:
It’s no fun if everyone is the same, anyway.
I hope you look forward to seeing what my
strengths are when it’s time for us to battle!
ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_01_10:
I don’t know what it is you’re aiming for,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_02_10: It may even be that you’re not sure yourself.
ch0003_00_calme/0605_0701_03_10:
But even then, I still believe that we’ll end
up reaching the same place.
ch0003_00_calme/0605_0702_01_10:
There are many different ways for people and
Pokémon to interact. Same goes for people
interacting with people, of course.
ch0003_00_calme/0605_0702_02_10:
Let’s work together to try to figure out
which way is best.
ch0003_00_calme/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are.
Here, I’ve got a present for you.
ch0003_00_calme/1701_0701_02_10:
I want us to get strong together, so
I hope you put it to good use.
ch0003_00_calme/1701_0702_01_10:
I don’t need anything in return,
but if you insist...
ch0003_00_calme/1701_0702_02_10: The only thing I want is for you to get stronger.
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_01_10:
There are some moves that are easy to use,
but why don’t you try out moves 
you’ve never used before?
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_02_10:
You might come up with new strategies, and
that’ll help battles go a lot smoother.
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_03_10:
Before you ask, no, I’m not going to tell you
what strategies I use.
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0701_04_10:
You’re one of my best opponents!
I want to keep my strategies a secret until
it’s time to actually battle you.
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_01_10:
Isn’t it great to have someone you really want
to beat in a battle?
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s a goal for you to pursue—
to strive for that victory.
ch0003_00_calme/2501_0702_03_10:
I hope you keep getting stronger.
Because I plan on going even further than that!
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_01_10: I have a friend called Serena.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_02_10:
She’s a pretty dependable girl—always
says exactly what’s on her mind.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_03_10:
Personalities aside, you have a lot in common
with her. Your strength, how you battle—
that kind of thing.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0701_04_10:
Maybe that’s why I get so stubborn about
beating you. I just don’t want to lose.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_01_10:
Serena used to be pretty quiet when we 
first met. Her personality changed only recently.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_02_10:
People tell me she totally calls the shots
in our relationship.
ch0003_00_calme/2511_0702_03_10:
It’s not like that, though. 
She’s just dead set on going her own way. 
Besides, it’s not like we’re in a “relationship!”
ch0003_00_calme/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning. I see you’re an early riser as well.
I admire that.
ch0003_00_calme/3002_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon and I are always ready to go,
morning, noon, or night!
ch0003_00_calme/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi there. 
I’m glad to see your Pokémon 
happy and healthy.
ch0003_00_calme/3004_0701_01_10:
Hmm... It’s important to take a break 
now and again, I suppose.
ch0003_00_calme/3005_0701_01_10:
How’s it going?
I’ve been doing some extra training at night.
ch0003_00_calme/3006_0701_01_10:
You’re out late, aren’t you.
I can keep you company for a bit.
